name: One Day (itch) (G Muhammad A A)
description:
Inspired by retro Platformer and Metroidvania games.  

Disclaimer: This game contains random facts.

You only have one day.

Programmer-Gusti Muhammad Audricio Ashodiq

Story/Sprite Designer-Muhammad Farrel Brammasta

GAME DEVELOPED FOR WINDOWS PC

CREDITS

Unity Engine

Unity 2D

HOW TO PLAY

A and D keys to Move.

Spacebar to Jump.
